Package marauroa.server.db

package marauroa.server.db
This package contains low level database stuff. In most cases you want to use the high level database access classes in marauroa.server.game.db.

The following class diagram shows the important classes in this package and how they work together with other packages.

  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    DBTransaction
    a database transaction
    JDBCSQLHelper
    A helper class that runs SQL scripts.
    MaintenanceDBFactory
    direct access to DBTransactions on arbitrary databases.
    StringChecker
    Helper class to validate strings and escape SQL strings.
    TransactionPool
    Connection Pool.
    UpdateScript
    updates the structure of the database to the newest versoin
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    DatabaseConnectionException
    This exception is thrown when the database connection cannot be established.
